description: This file is the entry point for a React-based web application. It imports React, ReactDOM, global CSS styles, and the main App component. It initializes the React app by rendering the App component into the DOM element with id 'root' inside a React.StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders a React component tree into the specified root.
